title: Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects

title: CronoFIB
description: Schedule maker for the FIB UPC students. It integrates the official university API to access subjects and other data

title: Longo Doggo
description: Puzzle game developed in two weeks for a Game Jam, ranked #3 over-all winner. All programming, art and music done by myself

title: Dodge or Die
description: Simple game about a spaceship avoiding projectiles with a retro feel
